avdta.network.node

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.Phase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Phase>

    public class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Phase>
    This class implements a phase of a traffic signal.
    It has a start time start_time to store the time when the phase starts and then also duration and green_time of the phase. The array Turn[] allowed defines the link pairs which are allowed to move during that phase.

             double green,
             double yellow,
             double red)
        Instantiates the Phase with the list of turns it allows, the green time and duration of this Phase.
        Parameters:
        sequence - the order this Phase appears in the signal cycle.
        list - List of Turns allowed in this Phase.
        green - A double value indicating the green time of this Phase.
        yellow - A double value indicating the yellow time of this Phase.
        red - A double value indicating the all red time of this Phase.

        public void setSequence(int seq)
        Updates the sequence in which this Phase occurs in the signal cycle. Phases for the same Node must have unique sequences.
        Parameters:
        seq - the new sequence value
